name: X1 Group
tagline: Building dedicated teams for tech businesses
description:
X1 Group is a product development company, headquartered in Berlin, Germany, with development offices in Eastern Europe. We’re building long-term dedicated development teams which become an integral part of your company while being hosted in our development center in Ukraine. Assessing the best candidates the market has to offer, our recruitment team also helps growing businesses and startups establish an R&D office in Ukraine. 
Our core services are:
Dedicated development team as a service
Custom product development
Remote R&D office set up and support
We specialize in:
SaaS platforms (including online lending and investment platforms)
Review aggregators
Property listings
Online media
Mobile apps
Blockchain solutions
Big Data applications
Electronic lab notebooks
Our key areas of technical expertise:
Frontend web technologies (JavaScript, Node.js, Angular.js, React.js, Backbone)
Backend stack (Ruby on Rails, PHP, Go, .NET, )
Big Data
Blockchain
Java, 
Scala
Python
AWS, Heroku
